mapper.select: SELECT SCENARIO_ID, SCENARIO_NM, DESCRIPTION, CRTN_TIME FROM SCENARIO_INFO
SELECT SCENARIO_ID, SCENARIO_NM, DESCRIPTION, CRTN_TIME FROM SCENARIO_INFO WHERE SCENARIO_ID = #{scenarioId}
SELECT MAX(SCENARIO_ID) + 1 AS MAX_SCENARIO_ID FROM SCENARIO_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCENARIO_INFO (SCENARIO_ID, SCENARIO_NM, DESCRIPTION, CRTN_TIME) VALUES( #{scenarioId}, #{scenarioNM}, #{description}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCENARIO_INFO SET SCENARIO_ID = #{scenarioId}, SCENARIO_NM = #{scenarioNM}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, CRTN_TIME = now() WHERE SCENARIO_ID = #{scenarioId}
